name: Access Partnership
goal:
Our mission is to provide our clients a way in to new ICT markets.

We provide an experienced, multi-disciplinary, multilingual staff to devise and implement a strategy for resolving political, technical, and regulatory barriers to trade on five continents.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market package, telecoms review, ePrivacy Regulation, Radio Spectrum Policy Group, activities of the Body of European Regulators of Electronic Communications, Space Strategy for Europe and the GOVSATCOM initiative.
